```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
# library(purrr)
```

```{r}
z <- readRDS(file = "../data/clean/results-clean-2022.rds")
head(z)
```

```{r}
range(z$id)
```

```{r}
ggplot(z, aes(x = id)) +
         geom_histogram(color="black", fill="gray", binwidth = 500) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of ID's")
```

```{r}
set.seed(2001)
groups <- stats::kmeans(z$id, centers = 4, iter.max = 20, algorithm = "Lloyd")
groups$size
```
